Title: Rokuhoudou Yotsuiro Biyori
Description:
['Kyousui "Sui" Tougoku inherits a traditional Japanese-style cafe called Rokuhoudou from his grandfather, which he manages alongside Gregorio "Gure" Valentino, Tokitaka Nagae, and Tsubaki Nakao. Their hospitality par excellence undoubtedly turns any one-time visitor into a regular. Having gone through their own share of trials and tribulations, the staff at this modest cafe do their best to serve their customersâ€”whether it be through tea, sweets, or even helping with the various troubles one may have.', '
', '
', '
', '
Although most days pass pleasantly, the small world of Sui and his friends takes an unexpected path when their reputation as a cafe flourishes overnight.', '
', '
', '
', '
[Written by MAL Rewrite]']
